statement.name: GetSpendingByChecks
statement.sql: SELECT check_eft_issued_date as issue_date, vendor_name, agency_name, check_amount, expenditure_object_name as expense_category, agency_id, vendor_id, expenditure_object_id, department_name, industry_type_id FROM disbursement_line_item_details

statement.name: GetSpendingByAgencies
statement.sql:
SELECT s0.type_of_year, SUM(total_spending_amount) AS check_amount_sum, s0.agency_id, s0.year_id, a.agency_name FROM aggregateon_spending_coa_entities s0 JOIN ref_agency a ON a.agency_id = s0.agency_id
GROUP BY s0.agency_id, s0.year_id, s0.type_of_year, a.agency_name

statement.name: GetSpendingByExpenseCategories
statement.sql:
SELECT s0.type_of_year, s0.year_id, s0.expenditure_object_id, j1.original_expenditure_object_name AS expenditure_object_name, SUM(total_spending_amount) AS check_amount_sum FROM aggregateon_spending_coa_entities s0 JOIN ref_expenditure_object j1 ON j1.expenditure_object_id = s0.expenditure_object_id
GROUP BY s0.year_id, s0.type_of_year, s0.expenditure_object_id, j1.original_expenditure_object_name

statement.name: GetSubVendorsSpendingByPrimeVendors
statement.sql:
SELECT a.type_of_year AS yeartype_yeartype, a.year_id AS year_year, a.prime_vendor_id AS prime_vendor_prime_vendor, a.prime_minority_type_id AS prime_minority_type_prime_minority_type, SUM(COALESCE(total_spending_amount,0)) AS check_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(total_contract_amount,0)) AS total_contract_amount_sum, COUNT(DISTINCT a.vendor_id) AS sub_vendor_count, b.legal_name AS prime_vendor_prime_vendor_legal_name FROM aggregateon_subven_spending_vendor a JOIN vendor b ON b.vendor_id = a.prime_vendor_id
GROUP BY a.year_id, a.type_of_year, a.prime_vendor_id, a.prime_minority_type_id, b.legal_name

statement.name: GetSpendingByPayrollAgencies
statement.sql:
SELECT a.type_of_year AS yeartype_yeartype, a.year_id AS year_year, a.agency_id AS agency_agency, b.agency_short_name AS agency_agency_agency_short_name, b.agency_name AS agency_agency_agency_name, SUM(total_spending_amount) AS check_amount_sum FROM aggregateon_spending_coa_entities a JOIN ref_agency b ON b.agency_id = a.agency_id
GROUP BY a.agency_id, a.year_id, a.type_of_year, b.agency_short_name, b.agency_name
